moves.1. d4: A nifty miniature that has Black misplay an opening with disastrous results
moves.1... d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 c5: Queen's Gambit Declined, leading to a dynamic position here - not sure if there is a specific variation associated with this position but it looks exciting!
moves.5... dxc3: ?? Black should know better than to trust this - notice how the king is the only piece defending the queen? fxe6 seems to be the only viable move here
moves.6... Ke7: Only move that preserves the queen, but...
moves.7. fxg8=N+: ! Nifty use of promotion! The knight had access to f6 and White removes that protection - with tempo!
moves.7... Rxg8 8. Bg5+: Obvious - Game, Set and Match! Short but sweet game!
